message: If I have an external domain mysite.net pointed at mysite.ep.io, is it possible to stop the site from being served at mysite.ep.io, or perhaps 301 redirect to the custom domain? I imagine that a site might leak google juice if it's available in two different places..
@j4mie You could use Django/WSGI middleware for now; we don't yet have the feature to do this at the loadbalancer level, but I'll add it to the TODO list
OK, I'll give that a try, thanks.
For posterity, here's the little hack I used to make this work in my Flask app: https://github.com/j4mie/brightonpy.org/commit/7781096e7294f77ec5377e2451113c7c3ccfc93e
I'm doing something similar in my Django app; posting here also for posterity: https://gist.github.com/1180163
